sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; function CreateAppointment({handleAddAppointment}) { const[formData, setFormData] = useState({ appointment_date:'', appointment_duration: '', appointment_reason: '', appointment_type: '', doctor_id: '', patient_id: '', }) function handleChange(e){ setFormData({...formData, [e.target.id]: e.target.value}); } function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() fetch(`http://localhost:9292/appointments`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type" : "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }) .then((r) => r.json()) .then((data) => handleAddAppointment(data)) setFormData( { appointment_date:'', appointment_duration: '', appointment_reason: '', appointment_type: '', doctor_id: '', patient_id: '', } ) } return (
) } export default CreateAppointment
